      Function now (children 1)

      Function toDateTime (children 1)

        Literal \'2020-06-01 13:31:40\'

The query succeeded but the server error '36' was expected (query: EXPLAIN AST CREATE TABLE a (number UInt64) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY if(now() > toDateTime('2020-06-01 13:31:40'), toInt64(number), -number); -- { serverError BAD_ARGUMENTS }).
